title: LF Gold-Platinum Support main for Ranked Team

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
Hi there!

I'm currently looking for a Gold-Platinum support main who is willing and able to play for a semi-competitive team in the evenings. Our team consists of Gold-Platinum level players looking to improve, a mic is mandatory and being a member of the above Discord is required. All applicants should DM me their S6 SoloQ rank as well as current SoloQ rank and FlexQ rank. The successful applicant will be one who has a focused champion pool, with a baseline understanding of the game, who can communicate clearly in a team environment and most of all someone of patience and restraint. 

I appreciate all applications and I thank you for your time considering my offer. 

DM Huskeeeeeeggghhhhhhhhgggghhhhhh on Discord and we can have a chat!
